epic.title: Messaging and Communication
epic.description: Implement real-time text messaging and video calling functionalities for one-to-one and group communication.

stories.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
stories.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly between individuals or groups.
acceptanceCriteria: Messages are delivered to recipients within 1 second under normal network conditions.
Messages appear in correct chronological order across all devices.
Unread messages are clearly indicated to the user.

tasks.title: Design messaging UI
tasks.description: Create the user interface for one-to-one and group chat, including message bubbles, timestamps, and unread indicators.

tasks.title: Implement real-time messaging backend
tasks.description: Build the server-side logic using a real-time protocol (e.g., WebSockets) for instant message delivery.

tasks.title: Integrate end-to-end encryption
tasks.description: Ensure all messages are transmitted securely using encryption standards.

tasks.title: Implement unread message tracking
tasks.description: Mark unread messages and sync states across devices.

tasks.title: Load testing for scalability
tasks.description: Validate system performance for at least 10,000 concurrent users.

stories.title: Video Calling Feature
stories.description: Allow users to initiate and receive one-to-one and group video calls in real time.
acceptanceCriteria: Video calls connect within 3 seconds under normal network conditions.
Video and audio remain synchronized with less than 200ms latency.
Users can mute/unmute audio and enable/disable video during calls.

tasks.title: Design video call UI
tasks.description: Create the interface for initiating, joining, and controlling calls, including mute/unmute, video toggle, and participant list.

tasks.title: Implement video call signaling
tasks.description: Use the real-time messaging server to handle call setup and teardown processes.

tasks.title: Integrate media streaming server
tasks.description: Set up and configure a media server to handle HD video streaming with adaptive bitrate.

tasks.title: Optimize audio-video synchronization
tasks.description: Ensure that latency remains below 200ms for a synchronized experience.

tasks.title: Stability testing
tasks.description: Confirm that 95% of calls longer than 30 minutes experience no disconnects or major quality degradation.

notes: Assumed that both text messaging and video calling are core features. Group messaging and group video calls are included unless specified otherwise. No prior context provided, so scalability and encryption requirements are assumed.
